about_the_game: The $MCRT Game Maker is a user-friendly tool for MagicCraft, allowing players to design and customize unique maps. This powerful editor empowers creators to craft epic battlefields and immersive worlds, providing a foundation for future integration within the MagicCraft metaverse. Features like exporting, sharing, and integration with the main game are planned for future updates, enhancing the potential of your creations.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 (High Sierra)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 (dual-core, 2.3 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000 or AMD Radeon R7 M260
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 (Catalina) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (quad-core, 2.7 GHz)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 or Apple M1 (integrated graphics)
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
